reviewText: How do I get this to play in the United States?  I get an error that it's from another region and cannot be played.  I tried Windows Media Player, Toshiba player, and several dvd players.  I was really looking forward to this, but I can't give it a good review if I can't play it.  I would give it zero stars if I could.  Can I get the software from the manufacturer that would allow me to play it?
